attributes.additional_details: Since Conservatives have lost majority in the House of Commons we the people of this country have been controlled by un-elected politicians who seek power by coercion. We propose that a General Election is imperative and should be carried out before the beginning of 2020 or as soon as possible in order for the government of this country (whomever that may be) to do as is required and restore democracy.
attributes.background: We as the people of this country demand a General Election to restructure Parliament and enable the elected government to govern effectively.
